title: Parataxonomy and diversity of local varieties of taro (Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott) and macabo (Xanthosoma sagittifolium (L.) Schott) grown in Benin (West Africa)
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Affiavi Aurore Sylvie Tamadaho, Gbèdomèdji Hurgues Aristide Houénon, Rose Fernande Fagbédji, Dègninou Yélognissè Innocent Ahamidé, Hounnankpon Yédomonhan
